chat_carousel.title: Chat with Your Trainer Now
chat_carousel.subtitle: Each trainer has personality, expertise, and a unique way to guide you.
chat_carousel.cta_hint: Every conversation shows the AI adapting to your context. Your data feeds increasingly better intelligence.

sofia.user_1: I've been on a diet for 3 weeks, but my weight is not moving. What's wrong?
sofia.trainer_1: I looked at your records here. In the last 7 days you ate an average of 1,640 kcal â€” but your current goal is 1,580. That's not it. The problem is on Thursday and Saturday: you compensated after your workout and went to 2,100 kcal on both days. This zeroed out your deficit for the week.
sofia.user_2: Wow, I hadn't realized that. Why do I get so hungry on those days?
sofia.trainer_2: Your Thursday workout burns a lot â€” I see you do HIIT. Protein on that day was 89g, but you'd need at least 130g not to arrive hungry for dinner. It's not a lack of willpower. It's just adjusting the distribution of meals on training days. Do you want me to set that up for you?

gymbro.user_1: I've never worked out before. I want to start from scratch and gain muscle. But I don't know where to start.
gymbro.trainer_1: Brother, the best time to start is NOW! ðŸ”¥ First thing: relax, you're in the right place. It's not complicated. I need to understand your starting point. Tell me: what's your height? How much do you weigh? And right now, can you train 3x a week or is it difficult?
gymbro.user_2: I'm 1.78m, weigh 82kg. I can train 3x a week easily, but my nutrition is quite messy
gymbro.trainer_2: YES! 3x/week is PERFECT for starting out! With your data here on the platform â€” your routine, sleep, real nutrition â€” my system will understand everything. I won't guess random numbers. I'll see how much you sleep, when you train, and then I'll build a plan that works FOR YOUR CONTEXT. Messy nutrition? We'll organize it together, day by day. Let's start logging your data and REALLY EVOLVE, man! ðŸ’ª

memories.title: Trainer Memories
memories.subtitle: Knowledge your trainer has accumulated about you.
memories.description: Your trainer uses this information to personalize workout suggestions, adjust your macros, and understand your goals. They are automatically extracted from your conversations and logs.
memories.delete_confirm_message: This information will be permanently removed from your trainer's knowledge. Do you want to continue?
memories.processing_warning: Memories are processed asynchronously and may take a few minutes to appear after a conversation.

chat.disclaimer: The Trainer can make mistakes. Consider checking important information.

nutrition.empty_desc: Your nutritional records will appear here.

metabolism.info_desc: TDEE is calculated by comparing your calorie intake with the trend variation in your body weight. The more days you record weight and calories, the more accurate the estimate will be.
metabolism.insufficient_data: We need at least 7 days of consistent logs to generate a suggested plan.
metabolism.plan_desc: To reach your {{goal}} goal, we suggest maintaining an intake of {{target}} kcal per day.
